task.name: importeovsa
task.shortdescription: Parallelized import EOVSA idb file(s) to a measurement set or multiple measurement set.
task.description: Parallelized imports an arbitrary number of EOVSA idb-format data sets into a casa measurement set. If more than one band is present, they will be put in the same measurement set but in a separate spectral window.
task.example:
Parallelized imports an arbitrary number of EOVSA idb-format data sets into a casa measurement set. If more than one band is present, they will be put in the same measurement set but in a separate spectral window.
Detailed Keyword arguments:
idbfiles -- Name of input EOVSA idb file(s) default: none. Must be supplied example: idbfiles = 'IDB20160524000518' example: idbfiles=['IDB20160524000518','IDB20160524000528']
ncpu -- Number of cpu cores to use default: 8
visprefix -- Prefix of vis names (may include the path) default: none; example: visprefix='sun/']
--- Data Selection ---
nocreatms -- If copying a new MS file instead of create one from MS simulator. default: False
modelms -- Name of the standard Measurement Set. IF modelms is not provided, use '/home/user/sjyu/20160531/ms/sun/SUN/SUN_20160531T142234-10m.1s.ms' as a standard MS.
doconcat -- If outputing one single MS file
--- Channel averaging parameter ---
width -- Number of input channels to average to create an output channel. If a list is given, each bin will apply to one spw in the selection. default: 1 => no channel averaging. options: (int) or [int]
example: chanbin=[2,3] => average 2 channels of 1st selected spectral window and 3 in the second one.
--- Time averaging parameters ---
timebin -- Bin width for time averaging. When timebin is greater than 0s, the task will average data in time. Flagged data will be included in the average calculation, unless the parameter keepflags is set to False. In this case only partially flagged rows will be used in the average. default: '0s'

param.name: idbfiles
param.description: Name of input EOVSA idb file(s) or observation time range.

param.name: ncpu
param.description: Number of cpu cores to use

param.name: width
param.description: Width of output channel relative to MS channel (# to average)

param.name: visprefix
param.description: Prefix of vis names (may include the path).

param.name: udb_corr
param.description: if applying correction to input UDB files before import to MS.

param.name: use_exist_udbcorr
param.description: If use the existed udb_corr results.

param.name: nocreatms
param.description: If setting nocreatms True, will simulate a model measurement set for the first idb file and copy the model for the rest of idl files in list. If False, will simulate a new measurement set for every idbfile in list.

param.name: doconcat
param.description: If concatenate multi casa measurement sets to one file.

param.name: modelms
param.description: Name of input model measurement set file. If modelms is assigned, no simulation will start.

param.name: doscaling
param.description: If creating a new MS file with the amplitude of visibility data rescaled.

param.name: keep_nsclms
param.description: Keep the no scaling measurement sets
